amendment.description: To amend the early learning alignment and improvement grant program under part I of title V of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to ensure that States support early childhood education programs that maintain disciplinary policies that do not include expulsion or suspension of participating children.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2170 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2170 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Booker to Amendment SA 2089.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2170 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2170 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Booker to Amendment SA 2089.
